name: Right Click To Hack
description:
The AI mainframe has gone haywire and has put the facility on lock-down, it's not letting anyone get close to fix the problem.

Your job is to gain access to the mainframe by hacking into the facility's automated drones and sneaking past all the security measures.

Each drone has a unique function which you can activate with the left mouse button and you can hack other drones by looking at them and holding the right mouse button.

Game was made in under 24 hours for the Nordeus Hackathon 2015.

The theme was "Squad based puzzle platformer"

http://www.nordeushackathon.com/

The game won Technical Complexity and 2nd overall prizes.

Team:

Kevin Tsang - Development

Julian Fisher - Art

Vivienne Wu - Music

Garage Band
